summary:
## Whale Sharks: Gentle Giants of the Ocean

Whale sharks are the biggest fish in the world, growing up to 60 feet long! They live in warm, open oceans and eat tiny animals called plankton. Unlike most sharks, they move slowly and don't harm people. Whale sharks have been around for millions of years and can live for over 100 years. They got their name because they look like whales and are very large, but they are actually a type of shark.
title: Whale shark
